dcterms:creator: Svetlana Kiritchenko
Saif M. Mohammad
dcterms:description: This dataset comprises English single words and multi-word phrases from the general domain. The phrases are formed by combining a word and a modifier, where a modifier is a negator, an auxiliary verb, a degree adverb, or a combination of those.
dcterms:title: General English Sentiment Modifiers Set

dcterms:creator: Svetlana Kiritchenko
Saif M. Mohammad
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on English phrases made up of opposing polarity terms, including phrases such as lazy sundays, best winter break, and happy accident. The dataset also includes single word terms.
dcterms:title: English Twitter Mixed Polarity Set

dcterms:creator: Muhammad Abdul-Mageed
Mona Diab
dcterms:description: This dataset includes single words and phrases commonly found in Arabic tweets. The phrases in this set are formed only by combining a negator and a word.
dcterms:title: Arabic Twitter Set
